entry.title: Song of the Day
entry.content:
http://b68389.medialib.glogster.com/media/4a8bc414abbe6239642483448253490d7e832ddea314ddf4e92f285d838236b0/louis-armstrong.jpg" width="150" height="300" title="#2" >

My happiness from finishing this website has carried over to today. This leaves me feeling quite buttery and eggish.

Song: Big Butter and Egg Man – Louie Armstrong

entry.title: Song of the Day
entry.content:
http://www.laterm.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/Screen-Shot-2013-11-22-at-9.11.50-AM-680x446.png" width="250" height="225" title="happy #1" >

My first song of the day goes out to me! I’m happy because I finally finished http://www.grooveunion.com and have it live and functional. Yet, I realize I still have a lot of work to do to perfect the website. Just like the song, coding can get repetitive and tiresome. But screw it because I’m happy!
